name: Bluebird Nest Necklace
description:
This item will be shipped out in 3-4 days.
....................................................
A pair of bluebirds painstakingly chose the perfect spot to build their nest. Soon, the fledglings will hatch and the young ones will need to take their first flying lesson.

These imitation turquoise beads are nestled inside a basket woven with sterling wire.

Specifications: The pendant is approximately 5/8 in diameter and the sterling dap and bar chain is 16 in long.

Variable lengths available at no extra charge up to 20 inches. Please specify the length you prefer in the "Buyer's Notes" with your purchase.

Each pendant is handmade and so will vary slightly.
The bluebird nest is featured in the first picture alongside quail's nest and robin's nest.

Payment Options: Paypal or Money Order

Shipping:
I am happy to combine shipping for multiple purchases.
...Domestic shipping is $2.50 for USPS First Class shipping.
If you would like to purchase priority or overnight shipping, please contact me so I can adjust the invoice.
::: International shipping is $3-5 (USD).
I use International First Class Mail and will ship wherever this shipping is accepted .
Please see http://pe.usps.gov/text/imm/immctry.14.1.htm for a complete list of countries and shipping availability.

Seller is not responsible for custom duties or import tariffs, taxes, or fees (or additional delays caused by customs.) Buyers, please be aware that you *may* be required to pay these additional charges when the package reaches your country's border. You may wish to contact your local customs office for estimates of these charges and for further information.



Locations: Besides Etsy, you can find Adorn Jewelry in Seattle at 'I Heart Rummage' and 20 Twenty.





All work in this store has copyright protection. The use or reproduction of any image or likeness must obtain express permission from the artist.

name: Photo Pendant, Lone Crow
description:
This item will ship in 2-3 days.
..........................................................
Crows are known for 'stealing' shiny objects and taking them to their nests. Well, this crow will steal your heart.

The image is set into a sterling silver pendant and sealed under a glassy clear resin.
This delicate piece is a tiny framed picture to wear.

Specifications:
Pendant is 16mm across.
A Sterling curb chain is available for an additional $4.00. Please e-mail me prior to payment for an adjusted invoice. The chain is sterling silver and is 16 inches in length.


Love birds? Make sure to check out my other listings with bird images and silver nests with eggs.

Payment Options: Paypal or Money Order

I am happy to combine shipping for multiple purchases.
...Domestic shipping is $2.50 for USPS First Class shipping.
If you would like to purchase priority or overnight shipping, please contact me so I can adjust the invoice.
::: International shipping is $3-5 (USD).

name: Photo Pendant, Crow Flies to Vancouver
description:
This item will be shipped out in 2-3 days.
............................................................
Not concerned with the velocity of his flight, this crow takes a leisurely visit across the border to Vancouver. He settles on a power line to watch the city lights reflect in the glassy high-rises.

This pendant is one of my new series, As the Crow Flies.

The image is set into a sterling silver pendant and sealed under a glassy clear resin. This delicate piece is a tiny, framed picture to wear.

Specifications:
The sterling pendant is 16mm in diameter.

If you would like to purchase a chain along with the pendant, it is an additional $4. Just send me a message after placing the order but before sending payment and I will send you an adjusted invoice.
The cable chain is sterling silver and is 16 inches in length.


Payment Options: Paypal or Money Order

I am happy to combine shipping for multiple purchases.
...Domestic shipping is $2.50 for USPS First Class shipping.
If you would like to purchase priprity or overnight shipping, please contact me so I can adjust the invoice.

name: Goldfinch Nest Necklace
description:
This item will be shipped out in 3-4 days.
..............................................
The female goldfinch builds her nest from vines and grasses, using spider and caterpillar webs to keep it together. She lines it with plant down to cushion and to help incubate her eggs.


Specifications: The beads are freshwater pearls woven into a nest of fine silver wire. The pendant is approximately 5/8 in diameter and the sterling dapped and bar and link chain is 16 inches long.

Each nest is handmade and will vary slightly from the nest pictured.

Payment Options: Paypal or Money Order

I am happy to combine shipping for multiple purchases.
